typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{Project ID} as string,
		Context as string,
		{Type of event} as string,
		{Type of Participant} as string,
		Status as string,
		{Registration Date} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true) ~> source1
source1 derive(Email = 'NULL') ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(input(
		ProjectID as string,
		Context as string,
		{Type of training} as string,
		Course_name as string,
		{Area of change} as string,
		{Service theme 1} as string,
		{Service theme 2} as string,
		{Date of data collection} as string,
		Location as string,
		{First name} as string,
		{Last name} as string,
		Gender as string,
		{Year of birth} as integer,
		{Professional status} as string,
		{Name of the entity} as string,
		{Type of entity} as string,
		{Sub-type of entity} as string,
		Country as string,
		Size as string,
		{ISIC code division} as string,
		{HS 6 digit code (if available)} as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
